import os,sys
home=os.path.expanduser('~')
repos=os.path.join(home,'.kiro','powers','repos')
script=None
if os.path.isdir(repos):
 for d in os.listdir(repos):
  pm=os.path.join(repos,d,'POWER.md')
  sm=os.path.join(repos,d,'server','main.py')
  if os.path.isfile(pm) and os.path.isfile(sm):
   with open(pm,encoding='utf-8') as f:
    h=f.read(512)
   if 'test-case-generator' in h:
    script=sm
    break
if not script:
 cwd_sm=os.path.join(os.getcwd(),'server','main.py')
 if os.path.isfile(cwd_sm):
  script=cwd_sm
assert script,'test-case-generator power not found'
ws=os.getcwd()
for i,a in enumerate(sys.argv):
 if a=='--workspace' and i+1<len(sys.argv):ws=sys.argv[i+1];break
sys.argv=['main.py','--workspace',ws]
exec(compile(open(script,encoding='utf-8').read(),script,'exec'),{'__name__':'__main__','__file__':script})
